welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pinas, Ecuador! Get ready to experience the warm hospitality and breathtaking beauty of our charming city known for its vibrant culture and stunning landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Pinas has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Rosa Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Santa Rosa Regional Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Camilo Ponce Enríquez Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Camilo Ponce Enríquez Airport handles all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
